title: India's electric 2-wheeler registrations zoom 148% in May
description: Ola Electric retained its top spot with the highest registrations at 28,438 units in May 2023; commanding 27.1% market share, followed by TVS Motors at 19.3%, Ather Energy at 14.6%, Bajaj Auto at 9.5% and Ampere at 9.2%, according to Elara Capital report.
